From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Rampage Snarled, "I will make you regret this insult Decepticon. Mark my
words, your suffering will be music to mine audio receptors." he angrily
shut the comm-link, and hoisted Transmutate onto his shoulder,
transforming into his tank mode. "There is more than one buyer on this
planet." and he rode off.
